---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This is a package.json file for the "inherits" npm package. It provides a browser-friendly implementation of inheritance that is fully compatible with the standard Node.js `inherits()` function. The package is designed to work in both Node.js and browser environments.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
The package.json file contains metadata about the "inherits" package, including its name, version, description, keywords, main entry point, browser-specific entry point, repository information, license, scripts, dependencies, and files to be included in the package.

#### Key Information
| Field | Value | Description |
|:------|:------|:------------|
| name | "inherits" | The name of the package |
| version | "2.0.4" | The current version of the package |
| description | "Browser-friendly inheritance fully compatible with standard node.js inherits()" | A brief description of the package's purpose |
| main | "./inherits.js" | The main entry point for Node.js environments |
| browser | "./inherits_browser.js" | The entry point for browser environments |
| license | "ISC" | The license under which the package is distributed |

#### Keywords
The package includes the following keywords for better discoverability:
- inheritance
- class
- klass
- oop
- object-oriented
- inherits
- browser
- browserify

#### Scripts
| Script | Command | Description |
|:-------|:--------|:------------|
| test | "tap" | Runs the test suite using the "tap" testing framework |

#### Dependencies
| Dependency | Type | Version | Purpose |
|:-----------|:-----|:--------|:--------|
| tap | devDependencies | "^14.2.4" | Used for running tests |

#### Files
The package includes two main files:
1. inherits.js
2. inherits_browser.js

These files contain the implementation for Node.js and browser environments, respectively.

## Dependencies
The package has one development dependency:
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| tap | A test framework used for running the package's tests |

## Configuration
This package.json file defines the following configuration for the "inherits" package:
| Option | Value | Description |
|:-------|:------|:------------|
| main | "./inherits.js" | Specifies the main entry point for Node.js environments |
| browser | "./inherits_browser.js" | Specifies the entry point for browser environments |

## Repository
The package's source code is hosted on GitHub:
- Repository URL: git://github.com/isaacs/inherits

This information allows users to find the source code, report issues, and contribute to the project if needed.
